description: Arafat, Yasir, 1929-2004 -- Photographs; Rabin, Yitzhak, 1922-1995 -- Photographs
label: Prime Minister Yitzhak Rabin and PLO Chairman Yasser Arafat agreed on November 8, 1994 to speed up the process of Palestinian autonomy as outlined by the Declaration of Principles and the Cairo Agreement, Meeting at the Erez Checkpoint at the entrance to the Gaza Strip, the two leaders - in their ninth public meeting - took several new steps to hand over administrative, powers in territories outside Gaza and Jericho in the fields of health and taxation.
